title: Basic Eggplant Scallop With Cheese
directions: Heat the oven to 325° F (165° C/Gas 3). Butter a 1-quart casserole dish.
Cook the eggplant in boiling water with the 1 teaspoon salt until tender. Drain and lightly mash. Add butter, grated onion, and 1/4 teaspoon salt and pepper; blend well.
In a bowl, whisk the egg with the milk or half-and-half until blended; stir it into the eggplant mixture. Stir in cracker crumbs and 1/2 cup of the shredded cheese.
Spoon the mixture into the prepared baking dish. Bake in the preheated oven for 25 to 35 minutes, or until set in center. Or, bake in 4 lightly buttered 6-ounce ramekins for individual servings.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and continue to bake just until the cheese is melted and the casserole is lightly browned around the edges.
ingredients: 1 medium eggplant, peeled and cut up
1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
3/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese or Monterey Jack mixture
